verses.name: Psalms 49:1
verses.text: Hear this, all ye people; give ear, all ye inhabitants of the world:

verses.name: Psalms 49:2
verses.text: Both low and high, rich and poor, together.

verses.name: Psalms 49:3
verses.text: My mouth shall speak of wisdom; and the meditation of my heart shall be of understanding.

verses.name: Psalms 49:4
verses.text: I will incline mine ear to a parable: I will open my dark saying upon the harp.

verses.name: Psalms 49:5
verses.text: Wherefore should I fear in the days of evil, when the iniquity of my heels shall compass me about?

verses.name: Psalms 49:6
verses.text: They that trust in their wealth, and boast themselves in the multitude of their riches;
